title: I would love to know why Jax hasn't been gutted yet.
body:
If you won't gut him, at least give bans in Blind Pick so I don't have to verse this cancer that can 2 hit anyone once he gets a slight lead.

Seeing a Jax 1v4 a team and lose 300HP is broken.

replies.body:
Stupid champion and I hate going up against Jax as well, but even so, you counter him by not dying to him.

Are you low on health? Back.

Simply either roam or attempt to sustain through his absurd damage. Build against him, even if you don't want to. Though he does ridiculously mixed damage so that part is hard. In other words...

Do not feed him.

Jax is fine. His early game was just nerfed so he's now slightly weaker. He's easy to shut down as he only has one gap closer which has a long cooldown and no CC apart from his stun which has a very small range. Just kite him, build against him and kill him as quickly as possible.
How can you kite a guy who can jump on your face every 8 secs then land a tun within 1.5 secs and then just BOOM you with his W? Its insane! HE must be nerfed or given a total rework!
